attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LJgDAJkB7weHYbb8-tu_desc
attribs.current:
Innate Spellcasting. The shellycoat can cast the following spells innately, requiring no components:

1/day: water breathing (if in possession of its coat)



1/day each: darkness, fog cloud

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LJgDAJoFYg5Gmni7EPl_desc
attribs.current: The shellycoat regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If the creature takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the monster's next turn. The shellycoat dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LJgDAJp5FTOL5dDDyni_desc
attribs.current: The shellycoat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide and any Perception checks that rely on hearing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LJgDAJqD9ym4JLzgLKv_desc
attribs.current: The shellycoat becomes petrified after 5 (2d4) uninterrupted rounds of exposure to direct, natural sunlight.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LJgDAJtzq4gefSAyoWn_description
attribs.current: The shellycoat makes one bite attack and one claws attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LJgDAK3flWb8xjfEgZd_description
attribs.current: Hit: 12 (2d8+3) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13), restrained, and poisoned (DC 13 Strength saving throw negates, lasts while grappled and 1 round after). The shellycoat can shift the position of a grappled creature by up to 15 feet as a bonus action. While it has a creature grappled, the shellycoat can use its claws attack only against the grappled creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LJgDBZoqoQLEMjgY09A_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a short reed or piece of straw

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LJgDBZoqoQLEMjgY09A_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends. Affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LJgDBtssfoXHkMsxJYE_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LJgDBtssfoXHkMsxJYE_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it. 

 If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness. 

 If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LJgDCCb8YNPlzoWouqs_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.
